    Agensi Pekerjaan Asia Recruit Sdn Bhd Vacancies Industrial Relations Manager (MNC in Melaka) - immediate hiring

    November 4, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Agensi Pekerjaan Asia Recruit Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Industrial Relations Manager (MNC in Melaka) - immediate hiring position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    Company Information
    Our well-established client is one of the leading MNC companies in Asia Pacific. They have created employment opportunities across SEA and they continue to strive further as the business grows. They are looking for a dynamic and result oriented candidate to fill their current job opening of Industrial Relations Manager, to be based in Melaka. 
    • Monday - Friday
    • Medical and insurance coverage 
    • Allowances 
    • Performance bonus
    • Friendly working environment
    Responsibilities
    Fully responsible on Industrial Relations framework and policies for all legal entities in Malaysia on daily operational IR matters, to provide strategic and operation business partnering.
    • Develop a clear corporate framework for Industrial Relations policies and guidelines taking into account operational requirements, employment legislation and best practice
    • Provide advice & guidance to management on resolving employee/industrial relations matter
    • Ensure Package and Dismissal are in accordance with Government policies, no arbitrary action is taken in order to avoid legal actions against the Company
    • Attend to Domestic Inquiries, representing our company for cases involving IR office and Industrial court
    • Work closely with line managers in planning & managing employee relations and welfare activities
    • Attend to corporate request and provide the relevant information as per timeline
    • Review current IR process and implement improvement steps 
    Requirements
    • Minimum a Diploma / Degree holder in HR or any other related field
    • Minimum 8 years of working experiences in Industrial Relations, Employee Relations and business partnering; preferably in shared service environment 
    • Demonstrated strong IR experience & competency in investigation, proper documentations, as Domestic Inquiry prosecutor,writing recommendation, handling court cases and working closely with appointed lawyer etc
    • Well verse in statutory requirements (i.e Employment Act, Industrial Relations Act) set by the Ministry Human Resource
    • Excellent interpersonal and communication skills in engaging stakeholders and external parties
    • Must be willing to work in Melaka
    • Must be willing to travel to Petaling Jaya as per work required
    Interested candidates please apply online or email to feiying@asiarecruit.com.my / jacqueline@asiarecruit.com.my .
    Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

    Company Overview

    It is Asia Recruit's (www.asiarecruit.com.my) vision to enrich people's lives through a better employment opportunities and to provide companies with quality HR consultancy and solutions that help them to get the right candidate, increase productivity, improve efficiency and manage the bottom line.
    As a licensed recruitment agency in Selangor, Melaka and Johor, with license no: JTK 1867, JTK 2467 & JTK 2623 and Endorsan 775, under the Ministry of Human Resources, Malaysia, we represent our clients, locally and internationally from small to large multinational organisations from various industries such as oil and gas, manufacturing, call centre, telecommunication, healthcare, technology, FMCG and many more with specialisation in the areas of human resources, accounting, customer service, engineering, IT, administration, sales, marketing, etc.
    For more job listing from our companies, please visit http://www.jobstreet.com.my/career/asiarecruit.htm.
    Our established client is looking for dynamic and result oriented candidate to fill their current job opening.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream job in Johor, Kedah, Kuala Lumpur, Melaka, Negeri Sembilan, Penang, Pahang, Perak, Selangor, Putrajaya.
    Apply Online
